task_data.title: Deep Conversation Testing - All Vendor APIs
task_data.description: Test DEEP multi-turn conversations across all vendor MCP servers (Sandfly, Proxmox, UniFi, Wazuh) to verify context persistence and API coverage
requirements: Create comprehensive test scripts for deep conversations
Test Sandfly API with 20+ message exchanges
Test Proxmox API with 20+ message exchanges
Test UniFi API with 20+ message exchanges
Test Wazuh API with 20+ message exchanges
Document all available API endpoints through natural language

sandfly: Show me details for host X
What processes are running on that host?
Are there any security alerts for this host?
Show me the kernel modules loaded
What users exist on this system?
What sandfly detection rules are active?
Run a security scan on this host
What's the severity of any findings?
Create a new scan schedule for production hosts
proxmox: Show me VMs on node pve-01
Show me resource usage for that VM
What's the CPU usage across the cluster?
unifi: Show me client details for device X
What switches are in the network?
wazuh: Show me security alerts from the last 24 hours
Show me file integrity monitoring alerts
Show me security configuration assessment results
What are the top threat actors?
What PCI DSS compliance issues exist?
What are the most common alert types?
What MITRE ATT&CK techniques were detected?

test_execution.tool: Manual chat interface testing or automated script
test_execution.context_verification: Ensure each response references previous context
test_execution.failure_tracking: Document any context loss or tool failures

success_criteria: Complete 20+ message conversation for Sandfly without context loss
Complete 20+ message conversation for Proxmox without context loss
Complete 20+ message conversation for UniFi without context loss
Complete 20+ message conversation for Wazuh without context loss
All vendor API endpoints accessible via natural language
Context properly maintained including tool results
Conversation summarization works correctly at 15+ messages
Test report documents all tested scenarios
deliverables: Test execution logs for all vendors
Test report with pass/fail for each scenario
Documentation of available API capabilities per vendor
Performance metrics (response time, tool execution time)

context.routing_reason: Pattern-based routing via MoE - development category
context.expected_outcome: Comprehensive validation of deep conversation capabilities
context.reason: Development work for critical testing validation
